data.title: Open Innovation Lab
data.description:
Boost Company innovation process and transform external communication leveraging internal talents to mentor and mature projects

  • Identify talents and better people involvement
  • Connect knowhow with projects need
  • Deliver nurtured and qualified Ideas
  • Find the RIGHT project, the right startup
  • Project integration from external application to validation
  • Real-time interaction during LIVE pitches

data.title: Corporate Annual Report Publishing
data.description:
A unique collaborative workspace to prepare, build and assemble the Group Report

Plan & manage all contributions from more than 10 organization on more than 190 sections edited throughout the 7-8 month length Annual Report building project and the 1-2 month length Half-Year Report building project.
  • Collaboration & Capitalization for fast rebuild Year after Year
  • Lean & Secure Editing to for high quality
  • Automation for better efficiency

data.title: Event Planning & Execution
data.description:
Embark and manage a complex ecosystem to create, plan and execute innovative events.

Involve of sales to invite clients and accelerate business with new opportunities, validate elements quickly with top management to align with corporate strategy, efficiently connect with all project contributors and embark external stakeholders.
  • Limit the non-added-value tasks to more strategic tasks
  • Improve the staff involvement
  • Increase external communication reach
